title: LSP4IJ user-defined language server client-side settings JSON schema

caseSensitive.title: Language grammar case-sensitivity
caseSensitive.description: Whether or not the language grammar is case-sensitive.

lineCommentPrefix.title: Line comment prefix
lineCommentPrefix.description: The line comment prefix in the language grammar.

blockCommentPrefix.title: Block comment prefix
blockCommentPrefix.description: The block comment prefix in the language grammar.

blockCommentSuffix.title: Block comment suffix
blockCommentSuffix.description: The block comment suffix in the language grammar.

statementTerminatorCharacters.title: Language statement terminator characters
statementTerminatorCharacters.description: The statement terminator characters in the language grammar.

useContextAwareSorting.title: Use context-aware completion sorting
useContextAwareSorting.description: Whether or not client-side context-aware completion sorting should be used.

useTemplateForInvocationOnlySnippet.title: Use editor template for invocation-only snippets
useTemplateForInvocationOnlySnippet.description: Whether or not an editor template should be used for invocation-only snippets.

enabled.title: Enable breadcrumbs
enabled.description: Whether or not document symbols-based breadcrumbs info provider is enabled.

enableStringLiteralImprovements.title: Enable string literal improvements
enableStringLiteralImprovements.description: Whether or not editor improvements for string literals are enabled.

enableStatementTerminatorImprovements.title: Enable statement terminator improvements
enableStatementTerminatorImprovements.description: Whether or not editor improvements for statement terminators are enabled.

enableEnterBetweenBracesFix.title: Enable enter-between-braces fix
enableEnterBetweenBracesFix.description: Whether or not the fix for enter-between-braces behavior in TextMate and abstract file type files is enabled.

enableTextMateNestedBracesImprovements.title: Enable TextMate nested braces fix
enableTextMateNestedBracesImprovements.description: Whether or not editor improvements for nested braces/brackets/parentheses in TextMate files are enabled.

enableSemanticTokensFileViewProvider.title: Enable semantic tokens-based file view provider
enableSemanticTokensFileViewProvider.description: Whether or not the semantic tokens-based file view provider is enabled.

enabled.title: Server-side on-type formatting enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not server-side on-type formatting is enabled if 'textDocument/onTypeFormatting' is supported by the language server.

formatOnCloseBrace.title: Format on close brace
formatOnCloseBrace.description: Whether or not to format on close brace.

formatOnCloseBraceCharacters.title: Close brace characters that should trigger on-type formatting
formatOnCloseBraceCharacters.description: The specific close brace characters that should trigger on-type formatting. Defaults to the language's close brace characters.

formatOnCloseBraceScope.title: The scope to format when close brace is typed
formatOnCloseBraceScope.description: The scope that should be formatted when a close brace is typed.

formatOnStatementTerminator.title: Format on statement terminator
formatOnStatementTerminator.description: Whether or not to format on statement terminator.

formatOnStatementTerminatorCharacters.title: Statement terminator characters that should trigger on-type formatting
formatOnStatementTerminatorCharacters.description: The specific statement terminator characters that should trigger on-type formatting. Defaults to 'statementTerminatorCharacters'.

formatOnStatementTerminatorScope.title: The scope to format when statement terminator is typed
formatOnStatementTerminatorScope.description: The scope that should be formatted when a statement terminator is typed.

formatOnCompletionTrigger.title: Format on completion trigger
formatOnCompletionTrigger.description: Whether or not to format on completion trigger.

formatOnCompletionTriggerCharacters.title: Completion trigger characters that should trigger on-type formatting
formatOnCompletionTriggerCharacters.description: The specific completion trigger characters that should trigger on-type formatting. Defaults to the language's completion trigger characters.

supportsGotoClass.title: Go to class support
supportsGotoClass.description: Whether or not the language server can efficiently support the IDE's Go To Class feature.
